original_title: Sri Lanka rupee closes at 319/320 against the US dollar, bond yields down
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT- Sri Lanka’s treasury bond yields were down while t-bills were steady at close on Monday, dealers said.
A 01.07.2025 bond closed at 26.00/26.40 percent on Monday, steady from 26.45/27.00 percent on Thursday.
A 15.09.2027 bond closed at 25.40/60 percent, steady from 25.40/70 percent on Thursday.
Sri Lanka rupee closed at 319/320 rupees against the US dollar.
